cyclone.name: JOSE
cyclone.current_location: about 1330 miles east of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: moving west to west-northwest toward the Leeward Islands and approaching the northeast Caribbean late this week-end

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Leeward Islands from Dominica northward, including the U.S. and British Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico late weekend
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds are possible at St. Croix late Sunday with a cumulative 10 % probability, peaking around 120 h.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands could bring brief heavy showers late weekend but widespread heavy rainfall is not currently expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Increasing seas and dangerous rip currents beginning Saturday night.
